body.name: Primy Office Chair Ergonomic Desk Chair, High Back Computer Gaming Chair, Comfy Big and Tall Home Office Chair with Lumbar Support, Breathable Mesh Reclining Chair Adjustable Armrests Headrest(Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 3 mins
features: 【High Back Ergonomic Office Chair】Do you often suffer from back pain due to being sedentary? Primy comfy ergonomic desk chair provides 5 support points (head/ neck/back/lumbar/arm). 3D elastic adaptive lumbar support, and large curved surfacefits the back, partition pressure relief support, relax the whole body pressure. It is a classic choice for sedentary office.

【Adjustable Coumputer Chair 】The reclining office chair can adjustable height 3.94" and has a 3-position recline function of 90°-105°-130°, allowing you to relax and get rid of your fatigue after work. The headrest of the desk chair conforms to the curve of the human neck, which can be adjusted 2.36" and ±45°. Armrests adjustable can be adjusted within 2.76" in height.

【Comfort and Durability Mesh Office Chair 】Comfortable home office desk chairs use premium mesh fabric, soft, durable, enhances breathability. High-density foam for lasting comfort, evenly disperses the pressure on the buttocks, don't worry about sedentary.The chair’s five-star base is sturdy and durable, with a weight capacity of up to 300 pounds.

【Big and Tall Office Chair with Hanger】Versatile chairs available in a variety of colors to suit every offices, homes, gaming,and conferences—ideal for various settings.The hanger behind the gaming chair with anti-slip particles is easy to place coats on, saving space and keeping them neat.

【Worry-Free Aftersales】The office desk chair comes with detailed assembly instructions and an assembly video that allow you to assemble the chair easily. The warranty period is 3 year. If you have any questions about our ergonomic chairs, please do not hesitate to contact us by email, we will to assist you to solve any problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and comfy office chair
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Primy Office Chair in Gray and put it in my new shed in the backyard . It has exceeded my expectations. The ergonomic design provides excellent lumbar support, making it comfortable for long hours at the desk. The breathable mesh adds a nice touch, and the adjustable armrests and headrest make it customizable for individual preferences. Whether for work or gaming, this chair is a fantastic blend of comfort and functionality.The high back of the office chair offers great support. The build quality is impressive, and the gray color gives it a sleek, modern look that complements any office or gaming setup.The build process is pretty straightforward. Just following the instructions and you will be set it up in about 15- 20 mins .The feature of lower back support makes it different to other office chairs . It supports my back and makes my work from home life much much more easier and comfortable.Overall, the Primy Office Chair is a solid investment in both comfort and style. It is easy to setup , clean and comfortable. Recommend it to anyone looking for a great functional office chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The chairs are very comfortable. Especially the lumbar support part. The color is very nice. Wheels are smooth. Armrests are easy to adjust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This chair is comfortable first off.Setup was easy.The back horizontal handle is pointless so we trashed it. It also wasn’t sturdy and kept moving.The wheels are really new so they’re not super rolly and kind of tough but I’m chalking that up to it being new and will loosen as time comes.The handle to go up and down is also like that. I have to jump on the chair to make it go down and have to shake the chair to make it go up.I really do like the color and this chair is comfortable. I’m hoping once I use it more it’ll start to loosen up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It deserves five-star praise.
reviews.reviewText: Teenagers can complete the installation independently. The metal parts are very heavy, which shows that the quality is very good. The wheels can move easily and are very silky. Children think it's great. They especially like to lie on the chair and rest their neck after playing games. It's very comfortable. It deserves a five-star rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My old chair recently broke I was looking for new chair.my room isn’t super big but is fits very nicely and set up wasn’t that hard at all .very easy to assemble.good quality and comfortable! Recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and smooth wheels
reviews.reviewText: My floor is engineered flooring, they are durable and easy to clean but also easy to make loud sound if wheels on it, but these five wheels on this chair run so smooth, it doesn't have loud sound like the chair my daughter has (which I have to buy a chair mat for hers). This chair I just purchased I don't think it needs the mat, just my own opinion. And the base cushion is so comfortable, it's firm and thick, the back support also give me the support I need. 100% love it. I use this chair in kitchen because I cook three meals a day and spend lot of time in the kitchen standing. Finally something comfortable for my legs and back!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the chair, very comfortable and easy to install! Especially for me working from home the whole day, this chair I can lay back a little which I love! Especially the white color. Highly recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent chair for this price range!
reviews.reviewText: I've put together a few of these chairs that have varied in style slightly. I've definitely put together and used chairs more expensive than this and not as good. The hardware for the chair was more heavey duty than the others. The arm rests are comfortable and adjustable in height! They're molded for your forearm and made of a softer rubber like material and not just some hard plastic. The seat is soft enough and the back reclines to a much lower level than I've seen before. It makes it nice for putting my feet up on the desk, leaning back and watching a movie on my screen when I should be working. This is a great chair at a very reasonable price.The one thing keeping it from a perfect 5 is that the back piece had a tear in the fabric around the plastic framing. Does it effect the chairs funcioning? No, but it does reduce the lifespan. I contacted customer service and they told me they wouldn't have any replacement pieces for a month. :(

reviews.reviewTitle: Comfortable enough and easy to adjustable
reviews.reviewText: Let me just start off with how comfortable this chair is! The seat acts as a cushion while the headrest is like a pillow. It's perfect for everyone in my family, especially because of the adjustable features; where I'm able to alter the heights to my liking.The chair itself is able to recline up to 130°. If you are in any case worried about struggling to assemble this chair, you should note that it has instructions that are simple to follow.

I am very happy with this chair, comfortable and provide great support. The chair parts is neatly packed and the material feels durable. There's a QR code for the installation video and with the same QR code you can register for warranty protection. The video is easy to follow and it only took me around 20 mins to put it together, which is easier than my pervious one. No fancy handle bar for height or back angel adjustment, avoid unnecessary confusion. I would definitely purchase again.

reviews.reviewTitle: Comfortable and easy to assemble office chair.
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice upgrade from my previous office chair. I put this in my home office and sit on it for a full work day without discomfort.The seat cushion is solid yet soft. The lumbar support does take a little bit of getting used to if you haven't had a chair with one before but it is helping my posture and seated position. The armrests move up and down, they don't swivel but I’ve only ever had 1 chair where the pads could rotate so I don't expect that anymore.The high back and headrest are made from a mesh material, the weave is thick so at first glance it looks solid. One spot on the fabric was a little worn through from the box, it doesn't seem to be frayed just like a little hole where I can see the white of the frame through it. It’s in a spot that isn't noticeable and it doesn't seem to be getting worse so hopefully it won't fray more with time. The back frame seems to be plastic but is heavy duty and when I lean all the way back it doesn't have any give or creaks. By default the tension came quite loose and the chair would lean back quickly but there is a knob on the bottom that you can twist to tighten it up and select a tension that better suits you.Assembly is quick and easy, took me about 20 minutes. There is one step when it helps to have another person hold the pieces together while you line up the screws but one person can assemble this.All in all I’m quite happy with this chair but I’ll update this review if that changes.

Very easy to put together, took about 15 minutes. Excellent quality you can tell and super comfortable. Headrest and lumbar support very good and adjustable and the white looks 👌I'd highly recommend this chair for someone looking for a comfy, ergonomic chair and not break the bank.
Bought this chair for my son to replace the old one. This chair is easy to install with clear instruction. Good material and workmanship. Generous size to fit everybody.
